Name: Sky Drop
Effect: Single Target. Charge Move. Out of Range while Charging. Vulnerable while charging to: 'Thunder', 'Twister', 'Sky Uppercut', 'Gust', 'Hurricane', 'Smack Down'. Flinch Target. If Target is Flying-Type or too heavy to carry this Move fails. See Strength chart on p. XXX
Description: The user carries the opponent to the sky, then drops the target from that altitude.
